title: News24.com | Melanie Verwoerd | Day 1: How to survive the Covid-19 lockdown
description: There is definitely light at the end of this tunnel. The only question is how long this tunnel will be in South Africa. That will depend on how cooperative we all are in the next three weeks, writes Melanie Verwoerd.
content:
